products.title: Sakura Pink Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Sakura Pink Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80113. A floral patterned, dim-out pleated blind.
products.productdescription: Part of our Sakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Pretty Pink
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Pretty Pink Perfect Fit Venetian Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Perfect Fit Venetian Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 180mm Max Width: 1300mm
 	Min Drop: 140mm Max Drop: 2000mm
 	Slat Composition: Aluminium
 	Slat Widths Available: 25mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Tensioned (lift bottom bar to raise/lower blind, wand to tilt slats).
